instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00165 No power
threads.message:
Hi!

No power, orange light.

PPBUS_G3H Shorted to ground.  C7431:1  was bad. I removed it now the short is gone.  It is ok if I don't replace it. I don't have a donor board now. 

thanks

threads.title: 820-00165 No power
threads.message:
Machine can work without it.
However, easy to find 68uF on different MacBook scrap boards.
Even 33uF is better than nothing...

threads.title: 820-00165 No power
threads.message:
Hi!

F7140  voltage on pad 2 was 0.1 the fuse got no continuity, so I soldered a Wire between Pad1 and pad2. (correct me if this is bad) I don't have donor boards yet.

Fan Spin sometimes spin or start spinning after several minutes. No chime or image

Here are some voltages!

PPDCIN_G3H  16.5 V
PP3V42_G3H    3.4 V
PPBUS_G3H      8.6 V
PP3V3_S5           3.3 V
PP5V_S4RS3       5 V
PP3V3_SUS         3.3V
PP1V2_S3            1.2 V
PP1V8_S3             1.8V
PP1V05_S0            0.08V
PPVCC_S0_CPU   0.00V
ALL_SYS_PWRGD   0.27 V

I thing CPU is not being powered.

Thanks

threads.title: 820-00165 No power
threads.message:
PM_SLP_S3_L goes high?
Any voltage at L7430/630?

threads.title: 820-00165 No power
threads.message:
I'm not sure what a "goes high' means but it reads 3.3V

So 

PM_SLP_S3_L     3.3v
L7430                  1.2v
L7630                  0.08 v

threads.title: 820-00165 No power
threads.message:
Post U7600 basic voltages; pins 12, 16, 17, 6.
Be sure to have good components and traces on its area.

Just in case, check L7630 diode mode to ground.

threads.title: 820-00165 No power
threads.message:
Somehow  soldering paste landed on C7616 bonding both paths. MacBook is up and running now. 

What exactly U7600 is for? CPU's power supply? 
Where can I find info about each ic is for?
I got info about most of them but there are a lot that still ignore.

Thanks again.
